          <title>
            <string language="hu">Fehérek és indiánok</string>
            <string language="en">Indians And White People</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Inder Und Weiß-Leute</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Indiens et Personnes de Blanc</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Indians E Povos Do Branco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Indiani E La Gente Di Bianco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ινδοί και λευκοί άνθρωποι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Indios Y Gente Del Blanco</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Fehérek és indiánok közelharca</string>
            <string language="en">White and indians hand-to-hand fight</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">indián kultúrák,  támadások,  népírtás,  </string>
            <string language="en">indian cultures, attacks, genocide,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weiß und Inder Hand-zu-Handkampf</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Blanc et combat de main-à-main d'Indiens</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Branco e luta da mão-à-mão dos indians</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bianco e lotta della mano-$$$-MANO degli indiani</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λευκό και σωή με σώμα πάλη Ινδών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Blanco y lucha de la mano-a-mano de los indios</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">indische Kulturen, Angriffe, Genozid,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cultures indiennes, attaques, génocide,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">culturas indias, ataques, genocidio,</string>
          </keyword>
